Package edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller

Class VehiclesController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller.VehiclesController
@Controller public class VehiclesController extends Object
Handles the Thymeleaf controls for the pages dealing with Vehicles.
Since:
2/1/2022
Author:
Logan Kirkwood llk1005@sru.edu

      Constructor for VehiclesController.

      Instantiates the vehicleTypesRepository
      Parameters:
      vehiclesRepository - Used to interact with the vehicles in the database
      vehicleTypesRepository - Used to interact with the vehicle types in the database

  • Method Details

    • showVehicleList

      @RequestMapping("/vehicles") public String showVehicleList(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Adds all of the vehicles to the "vehicles" model and redirects user to the vehicles page.
      Parameters:
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "vehicles"

    • showLists

      @GetMapping("/add-vehicle") public String showLists(org.springframework.ui.Model model, Vehicles vehicles, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
      Redirects user to the /add/add-vehicle page
      Parameters:
      model - Used to add data to the model
      vehicles - Information on the vehicle being added
      result - Ensures the information entered by the user is valid
      Returns:
      "/add/add-vehicle"

    • addVehicle

      @RequestMapping("/addvehicles") public String addVehicle(@Validated Vehicles vehicles, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Adds a vehicle to the database. Checks if there are errors in the form.
      If there are no errors, the vehicle is saved in the vehiclesRepository. and the user is redirect to /vehicles
      If there are errors, the user is redirected to the /add/add-vehicle page.
      Parameters:
      vehicles - Information on the vehicle being added
      result - Ensures the information entered by the user is valid
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/vehicles" or "/add/add-vehicle"

    • deleteVehicle

      @GetMapping("/deletevehicles/{id}") public String deleteVehicle(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a vehicle using the id parameter and if found, redirects to confirmation page If there are dependency issues, the vehicle is not deleted and an error is displayed to the user.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the vehicle being deleted
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/vehicles"

    • deleteVehicleConfirmation

      @GetMapping("/deletevehicleconfirmation/{id}") public String deleteVehicleConfirmation(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a vehicle using the id parameter and if found, deletes the vehicle and redirects to vehicles page
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the vehicle being deleted
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/vehicles"

    • viewVehicle

      @GetMapping("/viewvehicle/{id}") public String viewVehicle(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a vehicle using the id parameter and if found, adds the details of that vehicle to the vehicles page
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the vehicle being viewed
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "vehicles"

    • showEditForm

      @GetMapping("/editvehicles/{id}") public String showEditForm(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a vehicle using the id parameter and if found, adds the details of that vehicle to a form and redirects the user to that update form. Also adds the vehicle types, locations, and carriers to the form.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the vehicle being edited
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "update/update-vehicle"

    • viewVehicleDrivers

      @GetMapping("/viewvehicledrivers/{id}") public String viewVehicleDrivers(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a vehicle using the id parameter and if found, adds all of the drivers of that vehicle to the drivers page
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the vehicle used to get the drivers
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "drivers"

    • viewVehicleShipments

      @GetMapping("/viewvehicleshipments/{id}") public String viewVehicleShipments(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a carrier using the id parameter and if found, adds all of the shipments of that carrier to the shipments page
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the vehicle used to ge the shipments
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "shipments"

    • updateVehicle

      @PostMapping("/updatevehicle/{id}") public String updateVehicle(@PathVariable("id") long id, @Validated Vehicles vehicle, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Updates a vehicle to the database. Checks if there are errors in the form.
      If there are no errors, the vehicle is updated in the vehiclesRepository. and the user is redirect to /vehicles
      If there are errors, the user is redirected to the /update/update-vehicle page.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the vehicle being updated
      vehicle - Information on the vehicle being updated
      result - Ensures the information entered by the user is valid
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/vehicles" or "/update/update-vehicle"

    • getLoggedInUser

      public User getLoggedInUser()
      Returns the user that is currently logged into the system.
      If there is no user logged in, null is returned.
      Returns:
      user2 or null
